name: Fonix Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A FONIX file is a file that has been encrypted by Fonix ransomware , which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .PDF , .JPG , or .DOCX file, that the virus has renamed and encrypted. FONIX files can be decrypted and restored to their original state using Kaspersky RakhniDecryptor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
